evidence.text: Fifth Circuit Court ORDER - PER CURIAM Advising We GRANT the City's petition and VACATE the district court's 4/24/2019 and 5/24/2019 orders as theypertain to the documents contained in TAb 3 of Exhibit A. The City's Petition is DENIED in all other respects. We further REMAND this matter to the district court for further proceedings consistent with this opinion. (USCA No. 19-20377)
Joint MOTION to Stay Proceedings by City Of Houston, filed. Motion Docket Date 8/29/2019.
